definitions.title: n. pr. f.
definitions.body: given to bronze serpent 2Ki 18:4 prob. = bronze-god (so Thes, v. also Bau:Sem. Rel. i. 288; cf. [[נְחַשׁ נְחשֶׁת]] v:2Ki 18:4, Nu 21:9, Nu 21:9 );—chief arg. ag. this are vocalization of LXX Nesqalei, A LXXL Ne(e)sqan, and comparat. unimportance of material of wh. image was made; others think of [[נׇחָשׁ]] serpent (Nö:ZMG xlii (1888), 482 [[תן]] + [[נחשׁ]], Klo:ad loc. [[יתן]] + [[נחשׁ]]); Lag:BN 188, 205 thinks loan-wd.
